task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_title: Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretch Break Interest Survey
task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_introduction_text: Innovatech is exploring a twice-weekly 15–20 minute guided mindfulness and stretching break to support your well-being. Your feedback will help us tailor the program so it fits your needs and schedule. The survey is anonymous and takes less than 3 minutes to complete.

survey_questions.question_text: How interested are you in participating in a 15–20 minute guided mindfulness and stretching break twice a week?
What time window would be most convenient for you to join a mid-day session? (Select all that apply)
Which delivery format do you prefer for the sessions?
options: Recorded video I can play anytime

survey_questions.question_text: What, if anything, might prevent you from participating? (Select all that apply)
options: Already take my own stretch break

survey_questions.question_text: How important do you feel short wellness breaks are for your productivity and wellbeing during the workday?
What additional comments or suggestions do you have to make this program successful?

task_2_satisfaction_data_analysis.recommendation_for_next_year: Introduce additional prize categories and enhance the mobile app/online platform to make tracking and engagement smoother for participants.
